ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_0: And watch, for they will soon see!
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_1: And watch; they will come to know soon.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_2: and see; and they too shall soon see.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_3: and watch. They, too, will watch.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_4: And wait, for they will soon see.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_5: And watch and they shall see!
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_6: And (then) see, for they too shall see.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_7: and see; soon they shall see!
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_8: And watch, for they will (soon) see.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_9: And watch, for they will soon see.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_10: And see thou: they themselves shall presently see.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_11: and watch; soon they will see!
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_12: And watch (how they fare) and they soon shall see (how thou farest)!
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_13: And watch and they shall see (the torment)!
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_14: and see, soon they shall see!
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_16: And see, for they are going to see.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_17: [37:179] and watch; for they will [soon] see — this [statement] is repeated in order to emphasise the threat made to them and to reassure the Prophet (s).
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_18: (And watch) and be aware, (for they will (soon) see) they will soon know what will be done to them.
